lyrics:
5 contributorstwentythree lyricsverse 1
i got to tell you that he waited all his life
for someone like you to come make the wrong things right
i know he didnt have the answers all the time
but you cant tell me that youve never told a lie

chorus
were almost twentythree and youre still mad at me
so much that i said to you and i want to take it back now
twentythree and its so sad to me
you tell the world im dead to you
but i know you want me back now

verse 2
was it fun for you to watch him fall apart watch me fall
and suffocate him while you held him in your arms in your arms
i swear to god i wish he never let you in let you in
and i just hope we never hear from you again

chorus
were almost twentythree and youre still mad at me
so much that i said to you and i want to take it back now
twentythree and its so sad to me
you tell the world im dead to you
but i know you want me back now
see yellowcard liveget tickets as low as 30you might also likebridge
wasted on you wasted on you
wasted on you so much time ive
wasted on you wasted on you
wasted on you
on you
on you

outro
twentythree and youre still mad at me
so much that i said to you and i want to take it back now
twentythree and its so sad to me
you tell the world im dead to you
but i know you want me back nowembed
